////////////////////////////////////////Testing coin_dispenser///////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Inputs: clock 1'b; load 1'b; amount_to_return 10'b; 
//Outputs: 3'b - coin to return penny(001), nickel(010), dime(011), quarter(100), half-dollar(101), dollar(110); amount left 10'b; change_returned 1'b;
//format: load(x), amount_to_return(xxxxxxxxxx), coin_to_return(xxx), amount_left 10'b (xxxxxxxxxx) ----> x_xxxxxxxxxx_xxx_xxxxxxxxxx_x

//Testing dispensing each type of coin as change
//intial load of 0
1_0000000000_000_0000000000_1 //Test 1
0_0000000000_000_0000000000_0 //Test 2
0_0000000000_000_0000000000_1 //Test 3

//penny
1_0000000001_000_0000000000_1 //Test 4
0_0000000001_000_0000000001_0 //Test 5
0_0000000001_001_0000000000_0 //Test 6
0_0000000001_000_0000000000_1 //Test 7

//nickel
1_0000000101_000_0000000000_1 //Test 8
0_0000000101_000_0000000101_0 //Test 9
0_0000000101_010_0000000000_0 //Test 10
0_0000000101_000_0000000000_1 //Test 11

//dime
1_0000001010_000_0000000000_1 //Test 12
0_0000001010_000_0000001010_0 //Test 13
0_0000001010_011_0000000000_0 //Test 14
0_0000001010_000_0000000000_1 //Test 15
 

//quarter
1_0000011001_000_0000000000_1 //Test 16
0_0000011001_000_0000011001_0 //Test 17
0_0000011001_100_0000000000_0 //Test 18
0_0000011001_000_0000000000_1 //Test 19

//half-dollar
1_0000110010_000_0000000000_1 //Test 20
0_0000110010_000_0000110010_0 //Test 21
0_0000110010_101_0000000000_0 //Test 22
0_0000110010_000_0000000000_1 //Test 23

//dollar
1_0001100100_000_0000000000_1 //Test 24
0_0001100100_000_0001100100_0 //Test 25
0_0000000000_110_0000000000_0 //Test 26
0_0000000000_000_0000000000_1 //Test 27

//Testing the dispensing when the amount to return was $1.91

1_0010111111_000_0000000000_1 //Test 28

0_0010111111_000_0010111111_0 //Test 29

0_0010111111_110_0001011011_0 //Test 30

0_0010111111_101_0000101001_0 //Test 31

0_0010111111_100_0000010000_0 //Test 32

0_0010111111_011_0000000110_0 //Test 33

0_0010111111_010_0000000001_0 //Test 34

0_0010111111_001_0000000000_0 //Test 35

0_0000000000_000_0000000000_1 //Test 36


//Testing the dispensing when the amount to return was the max amount $9.99
1_1111100111_000_0000000000_1 //Test 37

0_1111100111_000_1111100111_0 //9.99 //Test 38

0_1111100111_110_1110000011_0 //8.99 //Test 39

0_1111100111_110_1100011111_0 //7.99 //Test 40

0_1111100111_110_1010111011_0 //6.99 //Test 41

0_1111100111_110_1001010111_0 //5.99 //Test 42

0_1111100111_110_0111110011_0 //4.99 //Test 43

0_1111100111_110_0110001111_0 //3.99 //Test 44

0_1111100111_110_0100101011_0 //2.99 //Test 45

0_1111100111_110_0011000111_0 //1.99 //Test 46

0_1111100111_110_0001100011_0 //0.99 //Test 47

0_1111100111_101_0000110001_0 //0.49 //Test 48

0_1111100111_100_0000011000_0 //0.24 //Test 49

0_1111100111_011_0000001110_0 //0.14 //Test 50

0_1111100111_011_0000000100_0 //0.04 //Test 51

0_1111100111_001_0000000011_0 //0.03 //Test 52

0_1111100111_001_0000000010_0 //0.02 //Test 53

0_1111100111_001_0000000001_0 //0.01 //Test 54

0_1111100111_001_0000000000_0 //0.00 //Test 55

0_0000000000_000_0000000000_1 //Test 56
